messages.content: Hi Athena! Here's the brief for our advertising poster project. Excited to work with you!
Thanks Marcus! I love the facility - that awning is going to look great stylized. I'll have roughs for you by end of week.
Here are 4 rough compositions. Which direction speaks to you? A, B1, B2, or C?
Love option C! The three-quarter angle really shows off the building.
Great choice! One more question - do you like the anonymized person on the bench? Adds a human touch.

question.text: Do you like the anonymized person on the bench?

messages.content: Yes! It makes the space feel welcoming. Keep it.
Perfect. Moving to detailed illustration now. Will share progress in a few days.
